details.arabic_diacless: رب احكم بالحـق‌ؕ وربنا الرحمٰن المستعان علٰى ما تصفون
details.arabic: رَبِّ احۡكُمۡ بِالۡحَـقِّ‌ؕ وَرَبُّنَا الرَّحۡمٰنُ الۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلٰى مَا تَصِفُوۡنَ
details.transliteration: Rabbi ohkum bilhaqqi wa rabbuna arrahmanul musta'aanu alaa ma tasifoon
details.translations: My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe.
